name: EF
title: (EF) Enhanced Factorio
author: Tremor
description:
Mod to augment vanilla Factorio. Mod is meant to be used with (MVC) Max Vanilla Control mod.

Mod adds Electric mining drill 2, Cliff grenades, Burner assembling machine and a slow-belt tear. Mod is bundled with slightly edited Enhanced Flashlight mod made by grfwoot and Nimphious' Cardinal mod that lets car/tank snap to angles.
